name: WAL-MART STORES, INC., v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RIDER). Petition of Leroy Rider
name_abbreviation: Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: WAL-MART STORES, INC., v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RIDER). Petition of Leroy Rider.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July 2004, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and CONSOLIDATE it with Gardner v. Workers’ Compensation Appeal Board (Genesis Health Ventures), 14 EAP 2004.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
WAL-MART STORES, INC., v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (RIDER). Petition of Leroy Rider.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 22, 2004.
